result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kevin E Callaway

defendant.name: Callaway, Kevin E
defendant.address: W10951 Lake Point Drive, Lodi, WI 53555

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Kevin E Callaway in court, in custody with attorney Ryan T. Frank.  Christine M. Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called: 15CM137, 15CM297, 15CM173, & 15CM138.  Recommendations given by ADA Genda.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant pled no contest to Ct. 1 of 15CM173 with repeater dismissed, and to Cts. 1 and 3 of 15CM297.   Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  15CM138 dismissed.  15CM137 all counts dismissed but read in.  In 15CM297 On Ct. 1 court imposed but stayed a 2 year prison sentence.  Ct. 3  1 year prison sentence, consecutive to Ct. 1, stayed, placed defendant on probation for two years each count.  Cts. 2,4, & 5 are dismissed.  In 15CM173 Ct. 1  court withheld sentencing placed defendant on probation for 2 years.  Court dismissed repeater enhancer, and dismissed Cts. 2,3, & 4.  Conditions of probation on both cases include:  AODA and comply.  Psychological evaluation and comply.  No contact of any kind including no third party contact with C.H. or her children A.H. or K.H.  $443.00 costs each count.  Must reside with his mother for 90 days at her residence.  In 90 days there is to be a review in court to check on housing and employment for defendant.  No conditional jail time,  due to his current time spent in custody.  Must report to probation by noon on 7/22/15.  6 month review.
Letter from S.W., ADRC Service Worker, re: bail/bond reduction request
Authorization to Appear filed by atty Ryan Frank

Attorney Ryan T. Frank appeared. Jordan Lippert appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Cases called: 15CM173, 15CM137, & 15CM138.  Authorization filed.  Atty Frank will conduct an informal pretrial with ADA Genda.  New return date set.  Return date scheduled for June 25, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
amending bond for defendant to no be on Rodney Drive beginning at the cross street of Cross Street in the City of Lodi ending at the gas BP gas station located at N2695 Park Street, City of Lodi
Bail/bond hearing on May 14, 2015 at 01:00 p.m.
to Modify Bond filed by Atty Genda
and Notice of DNA and Witness List with Petition for Leave to file Additional Motions filed by ADA Chris Genda
Discovery letter filed by ADA Chris Genda
For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by Atty Ryan Frank - by fax
with no violent contact with D.C.

Cases heard: 15CM137 & 15CM138, Defendant, Kevin E Callaway, appeared by jail video with Atty. Ryan Frank, special for the public defender's office. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Readings waived. In 15CM137, $1,000 recog. bond with no violent contact with D.C., in 15CM138, $1,000 recog. bond with no contact with K.H., workplace, her residence, not to be on her property.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for April 6, 2015 at 01:20 pm.  Return date scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
